nodes.text: The FA-504s was a transport vessel produced by the Corellian Engineering Corporation during the Galactic Civil War.

As a stand-alone design, the FA-504s was unable to compete with CEC's other transport models, such as the YT-series, and was seen to be a less-popular design. It measured twenty-eight meters in length and had the capacity to carry up to ten passengers and 100,000 metric tons of cargo.
